item.title: Show HN：用于生成MCP工具的开发平台
item.description:
长时间潜伏，第一次海报。嗨。我们最近启动了Gentoro，这是一个无代码开发人员平台，可让您生成，部署和测试MCP工具。 It’s powered by GenAI and fully built on MCP.You can:* Basically just paste in any OpenAPI spec* Or use natural language descriptions* Automatically generate MCP Tools* Deploy and test those Tools right away* Use the Tools via any agent framework that supports MCP (like LangChain, AutoGen, etc.)It’s free to use and we would love to invite you to come尝试操场，给我们一些诚实的反馈。谢谢！在这里是： https：//playground.gentoro.com/signup
注释url： https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=4444429590 点：1 ＃评论：0
